Miles McDaniel is a...

developer, adventurer, and wannabe amateur astronomer.

I'm currently a developer at Galavantier. Previously, I was slinging code freelancing for various start ups and established businesses across the country. Before creating digital products for a living, I built trails on the Oregon Coast as a Park Ranger.


Some buzzwords I like playing with are nodejs, react / redux, and functional programming. I'm always looking for an excuse to play with new toys.


When not in front of a computer screen I like to spend my time outdoors.
